messages.msgSnippet: Great, Dawn!  I just signed up.  I did my first quarterly report last week.  The style was based on an unschooler s; long before I even knew what that word
messages.messageBody:
Great, Dawn! I just signed up. I did my first quarterly report last week. The style was
based on an unschooler's; long before I even knew what that word meant (unschooling).

Kolein

For the serious part of your question...about staying legal in your
state, check out this group. The owners a sweetheart and should be

messages.subject: RE:Unschooling? Huh? (response to the group)
messages.msgSnippet: Wow!  What a chunk of change!  I mean, honestly, I didn t expect to get so much help (and a few laughs! I was beginning to think I was taking all of this way
messages.messageBody:
Wow! What a chunk of change! I mean, honestly, I didn't expect to get so much help (and
a few laughs! I was beginning to think I was taking all of this way too seriously!!! What a
relief!)

I can't thank you enough for the Mother of all Welcomes! I just know some of you are
laughing again. I feel like I can't help myself now!

But seriously folks....this is amazing. Thank you for your thoughtful and caring responses.
I was thinking after I sent the post this morning that the moderator was going to kick me
off the group that I didn't even belong to yet! Glad no one got offended!

From the bottom of my heart, thank you. YOU have helped me in a tremendous
way...links, words of wisdom, joy, love....laughs, especially those! Just amazing!

Glad I found you!
Kolein - NY
